speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Hey, nice to meet you again. How are you doing? Are you ready to get your knowledge tested?

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Nice! Let's get started then. I'll say the English word and then you should select the correct Japanese word.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Fantastic job #115!  You've memorized them so fast. I've sent the new vocab set for you to learn! Keep it up!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: No worries, study a bit longer and come back to me when you are ready.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: It's okay. Come back again when you are ready!
